code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Axios from"axios";import vilogo from"../Components/vilogo.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{});function App(){const[fdata,setFdata]=useState({Name:"",email:"",Phone:""});const[msg,setMsg]=useState();const changeHandler=e=>{let name1=e.target.name;let val=e.target.value;setFdata({...fdata,[name1]:val});};const submitHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();Axios.post("http://localhost:4000/Cform",{fdata}).then(res=>{let ack=res.data;if(ack==="success"){setMsg("Thankyou, We'll contact you shortly");console.log(msg);alert("Thankyou, We'll contact you shortly");}else{setMsg("Data not inserted");console.log(msg);alert("Data not inserted");}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"outbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:submitHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-items",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inputfor",placeholder:"Enter your name",type:"text",name:"Name",value:fdata.Name,onChange:changeHandler})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-items",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inputfor",placeholder:"Enter yout email",type:"email",name:"email",value:fdata.email,onChange:changeHandler})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-items",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inputfor",placeholder:"Enter your Phone number",type:"Phone",name:"Phone",value:fdata.Phone,onChange:changeHandler})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"formbut",type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:vilogo,alt:"logo"})})]})});}export default App;
